genusObject.author: G. W. Peckham & E. G. Peckham, 1902

referenceObject.reference: Wesołowska, W. & Szeremeta, M. (2001). A revision of the ant-like salticid genera Enoplomischus Giltay, 1931, Kima Peckham & Peckham, 1902 and Leptorchestes Thorell, 1870 (Araneae: Salticidae). Insect Systematics & Evolution 32(2): 217-240.
